MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L31 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:09pm . Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:19AM on 11th March 2021.
